author: Rachmad, A. et al.
objective: digital image classification system, identify diseases in corn plants, categorizing corn plant leaves into classes with certain characteristics
metrics: accuracy, true positive, false positive, false negative, true negative

author: Alkanan, M. et al.
objective: MobileNetV2 architecture optimization, enhancing accuracy in identifying distinct corn diseases, addressing limited dataset size and class imbalances through strategic model tuning.
diseases: broken seeds, discolored seeds, silkcut seeds

author: Mishra, S. et al.
research gap: designing plant disease identification methods that can provide reasonable accuracy on standalone mobile devices without Internet access
models: convolutional neural network (CNN), deep neural network (DNN)

author: Meng, R. et al.
objective: characterize leaf-level spectral signatures of corn leaves infected by SCR
research gap: the lack of SDIs-based models for SCR detection
limitations: limited data size, not considering other types of crop pest and disease
metrics: Overall Accuracy (OA), Macro-F1 score, sensitivity, specificity, balanced accuracy
dataset: leaf samples, in situ leaf reflectance spectra
future work: exploring the changes in the spectral signal of SCR over time, combining greenhouse-based experiment with field measurements,
